name: YOUNG1.WAD ver 1.0
description: This is my first WAD and I think it captures the spirit of the original DOOM levels - with a few new tricks of my own! Hardened DOOMers shouldn't have many problems getting off the level - but my challenge to you is to collect all of the weapons - they're all available, from the chainsaw to the BFG - but they're not all easy to collect...
